dataset_id_open_data_portal.title: DATASET ID (Open Data Portal)
dataset_id_open_data_portal.description: Autogenerated, unique field by the Portal

data_steward.title: Data steward
data_steward.description: Individual or division that maintains the dataset

data_source.title: Data Source
data_source.description: Retrieving data. Wait a few seconds and try to cut or copy again.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Retrieving data. Wait a few seconds and try to cut or copy again.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: Most recent date of data in the dataset

geographic_granularity.title: Geographic granularity
geographic_granularity.description: The geographic extents of the data in the dataset

frequency_of_data_publishing.title: Frequency of  Data Publishing
frequency_of_data_publishing.description: How often the data is published or updated on the Portal

data_source_format.title: Data source format
data_source_format.description: The digital format of the source dataset

is_published.title: Is Published?
is_published.description: Is the dataset publically available on the Open Data Portal

data_classification.title: Data Classification
data_classification.description: Privacy classification of the dataset.  Public, Restricted, Private

increases_gov_t_transparency_accountabil.title: Increases govt transparency and accountability
increases_gov_t_transparency_accountabil.description: Does the publication of the dataset increase government transparency (Y/N)

open_data_score.title: Open Data Score
open_data_score.description: Autogenerated score by the Portal when dataset in publicly available
